name: VintageTime
description:
You stucked in a old tape,looping in the music.

Only when you set all the nodes right,you will be free.

There is no pause,no backward or fastforword,only the looping of music.

If you can't figure out the puzzle,the song will replay over and over again.

Hope you will enjoy.The puzzle was hard.Try you best.

Tips:

When music node lights up,use arrow key to move.
